alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and central Pennington Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nemo, or 13 miles south of Sturgis, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Black Hawk, Summerset, Nemo, Piedmont and Dalton Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 43 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
